metadata.title: CVE-2020-36425 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Arm Mbed TLS before 2.24.0. It incorrectly usesa revocationDate check when deciding whether to honor certificaterevocation via a CRL. In some situations, an attacker can exploit this bychanging the local clock.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
